name: Button To Dance
description:
A foolish dancing game for 1 to 4 players made during the 2015 GAMERella game jam. Originally created for the Arcade Royale arcade cabinet, gamepad support was added post-jam.

Made by Chelsea Alsbury, Henk Boom, Nicolas Leray and Peter Rockwell.

Gamepad Controls:

left-stick ......................................... movement
A, B, X, Y ...................................... dance move

Keyboard Controls:

player one:
up, down, left, right ........................ movement
Z, X ................................................ dance move

player two:
R, D, F, G ...................................... movement
A, S ............................................... dance move

player three:
O, K, L, ; ........................................ movement
H, J ................................................ dance move

player four:
home, delete, pagedown, end ....... movement
H, J ................................................ dance move

F11 ................................................ fullscreen
esc ................................................. exit
